name: Souper Guy Vs Bean Man
description:
This game is made for Paint Jam #2021. 

I know the theme is not about the soup but the history. We just wanted to have fun and made this game. Hope you have fun too.

Whole game is just a boss fight with 3 stages. 

There is problem with the navigating buttons. So use mouse for the buttons.

We couldn't make a background because of limited time. And there might be some bugs too. And again because of time and the energy we couldn't add a music.

All the sprites were draw in MS Paint. But I added white outline in Photoshop. 

All the assets except the  font were made in 48 hours by us:

-Mahmut Esat Yerlikaya

-Burak Eren Can

Font by Robert Thomson.
